basics.name: Taylor Growden
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Taylor lives in Frostburg, MD. He is a full-stack web app developer who enjoys music, coffee, craft beer, opensource software, and solving problems.

work.summary: As an agency that focuses in the financial and insurance sectors, I specialize in taking the clients' specific, complex needs and implementing simple-to-the-user solutions.
highlights: Glowing commendations from colleagues across teams in first performance review.

work.summary: I work on custom web-based apps for a variety of clients in various sectors.
highlights: Designed and maintain custom API serving data to multiple different clients (including web and mobile)
Regularly keep up on emerging technologies, finding the right tool for the job.
Regularly added new features and maintained an electronic medical record app.

work.summary: I worked as a freelance web developer, designing and coding sites for businesses and individuals, ranging from single static pages to complex apps with custom backends.
highlights: Configured and maintain several virtual private servers for web hosting.
Regularly meet deadlines and fulfill clients' needs.
Worked one-on-one with individuals with developmental disabilities.
Complied with all HIPAA requirements while documenting on paper and electronically.
Created and maintained Excel databases for staff utilization-tracking.

references.name: Paul Maxey
references.reference: Taylor Growden would be an asset to any organization needing a developer. He is an efficient, and quick learner who dabbles in the latest cutting-edge technologies. His code is clean, well written, and he strives to adhere to best practices.

references.name: Wayne Lorper, Manager of Financial Operations, Bull Realty, Inc.
references.reference: [Taylor has] been patient, professional and have helped us develop a top shelf site.
